AboutMe.title: About Me
AboutMe.p1: Full-Stack Developer passionate about creating exceptional digital experiences that combine elegant design with high-performance functionality.
AboutMe.p2: Moodle Expert with an extensive track record in the implementation and customization of educational platforms. Specialized in the React ecosystem and mobile solutions with React Native.
